This directory is for storing Excel test data files (.xlsx format).

Example expected format for login_data.xlsx:
-----------------------------------------
| username | password | expected_result |
-----------------------------------------
| student  | Learn@123 | true           |
| invalid  | wrong     | false          |
-----------------------------------------

Example expected format for course_data.xlsx:
-----------------------------------------------
| course_name        | duration | instructor    |
-----------------------------------------------
| Java Programming   | 8 weeks  | John Smith    |
| Python Basics      | 6 weeks  | Sarah Johnson |
-----------------------------------------------
